title: Elegant Diamond and Gemstone Pendant - Addigai Design
materials: Rubies. Features a radiant Hyderabadi Polish for an enduring luster.
features: This exquisite pendant showcases a classic Addigai design, featuring a row of meticulously set diamonds in a floral pattern. The design also incorporates peacock motifs. Delicate ruby and emerald accents enhance the design. The cascading diamonds create a mesmerizing effect.
colors: vibrant red (rubies). A traditional and auspicious color palette.
occasions: or any special celebration. Adds a touch of tradition to modern attire as well.
description: A timeless piece that blends traditional Addigai design with modern elegance. Handcrafted by skilled artisans with exceptional attention to detail. The high-quality diamonds and gemstones ensure brilliance and lasting value. A symbol of prosperity and grace, making it a cherished heirloom.
